message: Starting investigation of current agent deployment and output capture implementation in real_mcp_server.py
Analyzed deploy_headless_agent and get_agent_output functions. Found key code locations and current implementation details.
Completed comprehensive analysis document. Now reporting final findings.

Investigation COMPLETE. Deliverables: (1) Comprehensive analysis document (current_implementation_analysis.md) with code locations, flow diagrams, limitations. (2) 4 critical findings reported covering tmux buffer limitations, Claude stream-json format, and implementation recommendations. (3) Identified exact code change location: real_mcp_server.py:1397. (4) Proposed simple fix: add '| tee logfile' pipe. (5) Coordinated perfectly with api_designer - they designed read side, I documented write side. Evidence: 10-section analysis doc with line numbers, flow diagram, code snippets, completion criteria checklist.
